content.label: Beautiful set and sound design. Fun puzzles so far. But there’s no level select screens, progress/overview, settings, backup, etc.
Relaxing, fun tunes, cute characters.
This little app remains like a hidden gem within the App Store! I absolutely love its simplicity and design!

title.label: Not a no brainer, yet soothing & fun

content.label: It's one of the few games where I want to go slowly & really enjoy it. I'd also recommend this for kids... it's very spatial relations (visual) & rhythmically/melodically (auditory) engaging!
This is probably my first time reviewing an app. ELOH was the most enjoyable game I’ve ever played on my phone. The art is adorable, the music is fun, and the puzzles are relaxing.

I usually never give games 5 stars but this game deserves it. It’s beautifully made and worth every penny you put into it. 
It gets difficult, but not so hard as to be frustrating, and there aren’t any ads getting in the way of your puzzles. 
The ambiance and music is absolutely gorgeous, I love the entire concept wholeheartedly—it’s super relaxing and helped calm down after a panic attack. Everything about this game is just soothing and nice, from the unique, simple, and friendly graphics to the beautiful background sounds and music that plays behind the rhythms you create. I highly recommend this game for anyone who wants something calm and fun to play when they’re feeling stressed!
This is the second game that I have bought from this studio. They are both fantastic. I wish the App Store had a follow function so I can get the new games they make when they come ouy!
Great way to waste time. I can feel the dopamine surging thru my brain!  Happy pandemic!

This game is perfect for a few minutes distraction to take a quick break.  It’s challenging enough to be interesting yet not overly difficult and frustrating. The rhythm of the bouncing pinballs is calming, and it’s fun to see them ricochet all over the screen. Calculating the angles while you play is fun, and I’ve never liked math, especially geometry (I got a D.) If you get in a tight spot in the game you can “snooze” the pinball while you re-think your strategy. I hope these game creators make a second version. I’d buy it!
This app is excellent!  It’s so relaxing, I just don’t want it to stop.

title.label: Beautiful, Relaxing, Challenging and a Fun!

content.label: My 8-year-old son and I (I’m 46) love playing this game together and on our own. He’s a djembe player, and we both really enjoy the rhythms. After we solve a puzzle, we turn on and off the “guns” to change the rhythm and watch how it affects the visual patterns. I limit his screen time in general, but I feel this game is truly enriching (My son says it helps you get smarter) on several dimensions. My son says it’s awesome!
This game is unique, beautiful, melodious and a joy to play

title.label: What a fun and relaxing game

content.label: Read the reviews and gave it a try. Music and beat is awesome. Very relaxing
There are no timers, no competitors. Just you and your puzzle and a super wonderful sound track. I turn off the sound on 100% of the games I play EXCEPT for this one.
The most authentic, beautiful, and enjoyful puzzle games there is

I love Eloh! It’s a good combination of puzzle and relaxation. 
Definitely recommend it!

With or without sound, this is a great puzzle game. The sound adds a chill, rhythmic ambiance and mood to an otherwise devious puzzler. The way the graphics, animation, gameplay, and sound come together is really masterful. If youre in the mood for a challenge, here it is! This game gets tough pretty quickly, but also teaches its rules in a very fair and well designed way. Worth the price, in part because it doesnt include any ads or microtransactions!
really don't like puzzle games, but this is a winner.  great graphics and a nice sound vibe...easy to enjoy :)

title.label: Great Fun. Absorbing Puzzles, Great Design and Sound

content.label: I am so glad I have finished the last puzzle. Now I can get back to work! A wonderful diversion!

The description is so proud of how this game is designed for touch and yet there is no multitouch support? Also the music has nothing to do with the puzzles as the description implies but it is rather pleasant.
Great game but frustrating, confusing, but great game and definitely worth or money.☺️

Hi broken rules!
I love ELOH I think it’s the best game I have ever played. I just finished the game and I’m really sad😢
Please make more games.
All my other games have so much glitching but this has no glitching!
Awesome game.
😃😃😃😃
Five star!!

I hope they keep their updates and never get rid of this game! They always get rid of my favorites! This reminds me of my favorite color elimination game with a twist and music! It’s nice to find a game that’s right up my alley!

I normally don’t like games you pay for, but this  game is fun and so worth it. No in-app purchases either. The rhythms and sounds add to the entertainment, and the levels really make you think to solve each puzzle. I hate fast paced games where you have to beat the clock. This is just relaxing, and you go at your own pace. So it was perfect for me! Hope these guys make more games like this.
I enjoy this game and what it feels like for my brain. I like that it’s a sort of mechanical feel to it. I don’t pay for games usually but this one I did.

I love the game, the animations, sounds, graphics.
Everything in this game is great and what I think it’s the best for iPhone games.

Not to mention a one-time purchase.
I just don’t deal with subscriptions!

👍🌹
Absolutely wonderful game.  Very challenging on many of the higher levels.  Wonderful graphics and music.  Thank you!!
It’s just so much fun!! Don’t hesitate! BUY this game...you’ll be smiling & bopping along to the rhythms in a very few minutes
Makes you think but not obscenely impossible, and the music and beats are just so cool!
Just buy it you won’t regret it.
I love the rhythm/beat aspect, super original, no annoying “please rate me” and challenging. Beautiful artwork as well. Well done👏🏽

Want to relax? Want to relax with a smile on your face? Simple but not necessarily easy, ELOH is an engaging, joyful exercise. Only game app I've ever thought to gift. Giving it to my drummer brother-in-law.

One of the most entertaining and good looking games I have ever played. For me, it’s up there with Monument Valley.

I highly recommend it!

I love that the music is part of the game. And (at least to level 46) it’s not a time-pressure game. For me, that’s perfect: higher levels mean more geometric complexity and new mask heads instead of speeding things up.

title.label: This game is like playing a good mood.

content.label: It’s the best. Try it. Relaxation.
Beautiful game with puzzles that tests your mind.  Well worth the money!
Wonderful sound design, great puzzle style, fun graphics and easy to learn play design (UI). Just a great game!
When I close down say at Level 50, when I reopen, it skips ahead two or three Levels. I deleted then reinstalled but still same issue. What to do?
Super addictive game.

Eloh is a fun and challenging (specially the last 14 levels) puzzle game, with some awesome sound effects that create interesting rythms as you play. My only concern is that it is a little too short... ¿will there be an update with new levels?

I am a classical musician and am usually bored or annoyed with most games background “music” but this rhythmic and pleasant percussive game is soothing and charming and pleases my music sensibilities.
Best app ever! It was so worth buying I love it and it is super zen

title.label: Most relaxing game I’ve ever seen

content.label: I’ve only just downloaded it and it’s just challenging enough to keep you from giving up. But still challenging enough to keep you interested. Overall great game
Literally zoned out for an hour the first time I played this game. Salon Alpin did an outstanding job in creating the visuals and bringing everything to life. Go get it! Now!
Meditation meets puzzle meets music.

A visual and auditory treat that engages the brain as well.
Kudos to the developers for doing an amazing job. Well worth more than the asking price.
This is the best puzzle game I’ve played in a long time. It’s s worth the money.
Challenging but fun! Love the calming music and new adventures and no ads! Well done!

title.label: When I get one right, it’s awesome!

content.label: This is a wonder game. It’s not digging into your pockets for spare change to continue playing. It just exists perfectly.

title.label: Type of App Store Game I Love

content.label: I’m blown away by this game. First, there’s no in-app purchases, you buy the game outright which is a win in my book. Second, the gameplay itself is extremely fun. My 10 year old and I started playing it together, and we’re up to level 31 right now. We’re both having a lot of fun trying different things to solve the levels. For a game I almost didn’t download because it seemed too simplistic, I take that back because there’s so much more to this than meets the eye (and starts getting pretty hard). We love listening to the music the sprites make when we solve a level too. WELL DONE!! I’d easily buy more from this developer in a heartbeat.
